title: MAGA Extremists Threaten Voters: "You Will Be Beaten"

media:group.media:title: MAGA Extremists Threaten Voters: "You Will Be Beaten"
media:group.media:description:
Clean Elections USA has been slapped with a restraining order after releasing plans to intimidate people at election boxes. Ana Kasparian and Cenk Uygur discuss on The Young Turks. Watch TYT LIVE on weekdays 6-8 pm ET. http://youtube.com/theyoungturks/live

Read more HERE:  https://www.vice.com/en/article/wxnbzx/pro-trump-extremist-midterm-voter-threats

"Days before the U.S. government issued a chilling memo about the threat domestic extremists pose to next week‚Äôs elections, a member of the far-right message board known as The Donald threatened voters in Arizona with a message that eerily echoed much of the government‚Äôs warning.

‚ÄúWe will post up at every single drop box,‚Äù the user wrote. ‚ÄúIf you try to drop off more than one ballot, you will be beaten without question. Better tell your gramma to drop off her own vote cause no games are being played this time. You will see violence if caught stuffing ballots in a drop box.‚Äù*
